explains: n. （军事上的）伪装，隐蔽；（士兵作伪装用的）迷彩服，伪装色；（动物的）保护色，保护形状；掩饰，欺瞒
v. 掩饰；伪装；掩盖（真相）；（用声音）盖过
wordGroup: camouflage pattern 迷彩图案；伪装印花布

sentences.en: They were dressed in camouflage and carried automatic rifles.
sentences.cn: 他们身着迷彩服，手持自动步枪。

sentences.en: There was much laughter – a perfect camouflage for the anxiety of waiting for the verdict in the trial.
sentences.cn: 笑声不断–审判中等待裁决时焦虑的最佳掩饰。

sentences.en: One of its adaptations is basically camouflage.
sentences.cn: 它的一种基本的适应性是伪装。
